top_categories.workout_context: At 112 miles, D2R2 punishes athletes who haven’t trained their body to produce power when glycogen runs low.
D2R2 rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at D2R2 when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of D2R2. Make this intensity feel like home.
Racing D2R2 isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
D2R2’s massachusetts rolling hills, rural gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
D2R2’s 7,000ft of climbing demands seated and standing versatility — the ability to change climbing style as gradient and fatigue dictate.
D2R2’s massachusetts rolling hills gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Every session at D2R2 intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
At 112 miles, D2R2 rewards a massive aerobic engine. This volume work builds the fat-oxidation capacity that keeps you moving when glycogen runs low.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what D2R2’s massachusetts rolling hills gravel delivers on race day.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for D2R2 — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for D2R2’s 112 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at D2R2 requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on massachusetts rolling hills gravel to build confidence. Expect: massachusetts rolling hills, rural gravel, 180km distance.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, TT Threshold, and Over Under to prepare you for 112 miles of massachusetts rolling hills gravel in Deerfield, Massachusetts.
